Title: Upgrade of ESA-22D photoelectron spectrometer
Abstract: © Published under licence by IOP Publishing Ltd.Electron spectroscopy is a widely used method for observing the structure and fundamental processes in atomic systems. By employing energy- and angle-resolved photoelectron spectroscopy, valuable information can be obtained about ionization and excitation in photon-atom interactions.
